issue.title: Orientation does not work in topic /ihmc_ros/valkyrie/control/hand_trajectory

content.raw:
I don't understand why this isn't a blocker.

To Steven: Competitors have asked about creating their own controller instead of using the one from IHMC. They've been told no. IMO your suggest is to create our own controller for the arm and hand albeit using MoveIt. Seems contradictory.
content.html:
I don't understand why this isn't a blocker.

To Steven: Competitors have asked about creating their own controller instead of using the one from IHMC. They've been told no. IMO your suggest is to create our own controller for the arm and hand albeit using MoveIt. Seems contradictory.
